summary: The module implements high‑level factory classes that automatically select and instantiate the correct diffusion pipeline for a given task (image‑to‑image, inpainting, or text‑to‑image) based on model configuration or an existing pipeline instance, while preventing direct construction of the factories.
business_intent: Provide a user‑friendly interface that abstracts away the complexity of choosing the right diffusion pipeline, enabling developers to load pretrained models and perform image generation tasks with minimal setup.
